attributes.action: Release the name of the judge and social workers in the Sara Sharif case.
attributes.background: I feel as though the judiciary and care-workers who failed to do their job in the case of Sara Sharif should not be allowed anonymity.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what information to release in relation to individual family court cases are a matter for the courts, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The names of the judges involved in the previous proceedings have now been published.
